pages.text: Matches items or fluids by their resource tags (like minecraft:logs or c:ores/iron). You can type a tag with or without the # prefix.$(br2)Set it to whitelist or blacklist, and pick whether it targets items or fluids.

pages.title: On Export vs Import
pages.text: $(l)On an export channel:$() Only items/fluids with the matching tag get pulled out of the source.$(br2)$(l)On an import channel:$() The destination only accepts items/fluids with the matching tag.$(br2)Both sides are checked. An item needs to pass the export tag filter AND the import tag filter to transfer.
